networking.generic_verification_failure: Something went wrong with your unique link. Fill out the form below to have a new one sent to your email. Please contact the Opentrons Support team if you require further help.
networking.unauthorized_verification_failure: This unique link has expired and is no longer valid, to have a new link sent to your email, fill out the form below.
networking.validation_server_failure: There was a problem communicating with the Opentrons validation server. Please make sure you are still connected to the internet and try again. If this problem persists, please contact Opentrons support.
